sentence.Network_en: But their left - handedness doesn't appear to give them any edge in politics.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是,左撇子在政治领域并没有特别突出的表现.

sentence.Network_en: Do children inherit left - handedness from their parents?
sentence.Network_cn: 孩子会从父母身上遗传左撇子 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: Also, some more restrictive societies show less left - handedness in their populations than other more permissive societies.
sentence.Network_cn: 相比与那些更加宽容的社会, 在一些限制更多的社会中,使用左手的人要少一些.

PerfectNetExp.abs: several studies have also examined whether there is any relationship between left-handedness and increased risk of immune disorders .几个研究也调查了是否左手习惯增加免疫系统疾病的风险。

list.abs: 左撇子（Left-handedness），是惯用左手而不是右手的偏好。惯用左手的人倾向于惯用左脚，并且通常左侧的身体更为强壮灵巧。
心理学词汇(psychology) 8 ... 大脑功能偏侧化 lateralization of the brain 左利手 left handedness 右利手 right handedness.
